New Records: Suryakumar Yadav hit his 3rd hundred in T20Is.
Suryakumar Yadav scored the second-fastest T20I hundred by an Indian batter off 45 balls.
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 112 runs vs Sri Lanka in Rajkot.
Suryakumar Yadav got to his half-century off 26 balls.
Suryakumar Yadav was involved in a partnership of 113 runs with Shubman Gill, who scored 46 off 36 balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Lasith Malinga praised Suryakumar Yadav's performance, calling it a T20 batting masterclass.
Ian Bishop commented on Suryakumar Yadav's late debut and its impact on his performance.
Wasim Jaffer called Suryakumar Yadav the best in the world and praised his ease of play.
Kamran Akmal praised Suryakumar Yadav's batting, calling it worth watching.
Aakash Chopra stated that Suryakumar Yadav is in a league of his own and the best T20 batter in the world right now.
